CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Find Related Search (Sender & Conversation)
CurrentVersion.description: Find related search allows users to search for similar emails based on one selected from the message list. Right clicking an email and selecting "Find related" offers users the chance to search for “Messages in this conversation” and “Messages from sender”.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Find Related Search (Sender & Conversation)
OldVersion.description:
Find related search allows users to search for
similar emails based on one selected from the message list. Right clicking an
email and selecting "Find related" offers users the chance to search
for “Messages in this conversation” and “Messages from sender”.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
CurrentVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
OldVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to customize reminders
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to customize survey reminders, nudges and other notifications and support additional languages

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to customize reminders
OldVersion.description: Ability to customize survey reminders, nudges and other notifications and support additional languages

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
OldVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your activity notifications from the activity card
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to control what shows in their activity feed by clicking on the ellipsis from the activity card, helping them to stay on top of the information that matters most to them.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your activity notifications from the activity card
OldVersion.description:
Users will be able to
control what shows in their activity feed by clicking on the ellipsis from the
activity card, helping them to stay on top of the information that matters most
to them.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description: With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
OldVersion.description:
With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to
download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic Targeting based on roles for Frontline
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline teams can notify the right set of colleagues on channel posts (e.g. notify colleagues in specific role or department)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options updates for Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting options for a webinar are now accessible within the webinar setup in Teams. Organizers can edit meeting options in an inline window within the scheduling form in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
CurrentVersion.description: ,Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Calendar Items in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now filter your message list for conversations that have calendar invites when using the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Getting an overview of new meetings you're invited to and RSVP-ing to them directly in the message list becomes much easier with this new filter.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business available in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in classic Outlook for Windows, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Browser optimized playback for SuccessFactors content in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Browser optimized playback for SuccessFactors content
OldVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.
